tasks.task_description: Fix 'Become a Partner' link routing on homepage
Create partner application form with business details
Add partner status validation for solution management access
Implement admin approval workflow for partner applications
Test complete partner workflow: register -> apply -> admin approve -> solution management

description: Fix partner workflow issues - implement missing partner application and approval system
context: Fixed 'Become a Partner' link routing from /register?role=partner to /partners. Enhanced partner application form with comprehensive business details including business type, tax ID, contact person, phone, address, city, and country fields as required by specifications.
